title: Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 3
alternative_title: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas Part 3, チェインクロニクル〜ヘクセイタスの閃（ひかり）〜 第３章
description: Set in the land of Yuguto, the people thought that the land they live is the size of the world, but it’s actually divided into several areas, each with a respective king. Even though there were small wars among areas, the kings had roundtable meetings to maintain peace and balance. It was until a dark group of dark monsters appeared...
